name: MT-Faithful
short_description:
MT-Faithful is a texture pack for Minetest, an infinite-world block sandbox game.

The texture pack provides 32x32px textures. It was inspired by the Minecraft faithful pack, but instead is faithful to the default minetest textures. MT-Faithful is released under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0.

We currently only have textures for minetest_game, but support for other mods (and maybe games) is coming soon.

Customize and download the texture pack at the following address:
http://mt-faithful.sf.net/cgi-bin/download.py

See http://mt-faithful.sf.net/ for more (or possibly less) information, and help about contributing.
